segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy, barely tall enough for the counter, attempting quite a feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s standing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, making it look like it's about to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open upper cabinet, where a "COOKIE JAR" sits, filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already deep inside, pulling out treats, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems he's using the plate to catch the cookies as he takes them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, looking up with an eager expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, clearly expecting her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't give way with him up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a dangerous situation to be in for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the risks children will take.
segments.speaker: PAR
